title: ex2D
description:
ex2D is a highly integrated 2D-sprite-related development extension for Unity. It aims at providing high performance 2D sprite/UI solution inside Unity, with a specific focus on creating tons of cutting-edge sprite animations and other content in complicated Unity scenes, while still maintaining great performance on mobile devices.



Important: Upgrade from v1.1.0 to v1.1.1

Links:

> ex2D Website | Online Documentation | Change List | Forum Thread

Downloads:

> Offline Documentation | Offline Script Reference
changes:
* New Features
  * Add offset in exPlane, user can use offset adjust the anchor of exSprite and exSpriteFont
  * When raw-texture changes (by Image Editor such as PhotoShop), ex2D will detect and rebuild the atlas to fit the new texture
  * Sample Rate for Sprite Animation Clip
  * Add buildColor in exAtlasInfo, user now can custom the background color of atlas texture
* Changes
  * Remove renderCamera property from exPixelPerfect, exViewportPosition and exScreenPostion. Instead, add renderCamera in exPlane
  * Add toolbar for atlas and sprite animation clip editor, move some button to toolbar
  * Frame based sprite animation editor, event and frame info are now snap to frame, and depends on Sample Rate
* Bugs Fixed
  * Fix MeshCollider not changes when autoResizeCollision is true
  * Fix Prefab can not change Layer2D, PixelPerfect, Transform2D, Physics Collider settings
  * Fix Animation Helpers can't preview the result in the animating mode in Animation View
  * Fix Sprite Animation NOT play first frame
  * Fix Sprite Animation NOT trigger event in first frame
